definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: Cautiously, I walked around to the director’s side of the car.
sentences.chinese: 我小心翼翼地繞着理事長的車邊走動。

sentences.english: Margaret Chan, Director-General of the World Health Organization.
sentences.chinese: 世界衛生組織理事長陳女士說。

sentences.english: The director opened her door and got out.
sentences.chinese: 理事長打開車門下了車。

sentences.english: Brett Gorvy, is the Deputy Chairman of Christies Americas.
sentences.chinese: 布萊特格瑞是美國佳士得拍賣行副理事長。

sentences.english: I imagined the director’s husband with the telephone in his hand.
sentences.chinese: 我設想出理事長的丈夫手裏拿着電話的情形。

sentences.english: Chinese shipbuilding project learns director Wang Rongsheng to publish serious talk.
sentences.chinese: 中國造船工程學會理事長王榮生髮表重要講話。

sentences.english: The current chairman of the Group to pay Wancheng.
sentences.chinese: 現任集團理事長付萬成。

sentences.english: Ai Ping, executive president of China Center for Contemporary World Studies was also present at the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 當代世界研究中心執行理事長艾平參加了會見。

sentences.english: Heilongjiang Province Head and Neck Surgery Association vice president, the Secretary-General.
sentences.chinese: 黑龍江省頭頸外科協會副理事長，祕書長。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, we are also the vice president of China Disc Association.
sentences.chinese: 同時，我們也是中國光盤同盟的副理事長單位。

sentences.english: Currently, he is the Director of Creative Writing at Harvard University.
sentences.chinese: 目前，他任哈弗大學創新寫作理事長。

sentences.english: Not unless he’s changed his license plates, the director said.
sentences.chinese: 要麼就是他換了車牌號，理事長說。

sentences.english: When we got back to the motel, the director got out of the car and walked with me part of the way.
sentences.chinese: 我們到了汽車旅館時，理事長下車陪我走了一段路。

sentences.english: Mme Peng Yanli, President of China Wool Textile Association, addressed the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 中國毛紡織行業協會理事長彭燕麗女士到會致辭。

sentences.english: Cao is also a vice chairman of the China Association of Private Education.
sentences.chinese: 同時擔任中國民辦教育協會副理事長。

sentences.english: He’ll stay there until we go, the director said.
sentences.chinese: 他會呆在那兒直到我們離開，理事長說。

definition: president of a club, committee etc
to make a speech/to make some remarks
to express in words or writing/to make a speech (esp. short introduction, vote of thanks, afterword, funeral homily etc)/to address (an audience)/same as 致詞|致词
